programme.title: Omerta
programme.desc: Inflamed by a sense of hatred and revenge, Ahmed Omar Sheikh kidnaps and murders a Wall Street Journal reporter named Daniel Pearl.

programme.title: Gully Boy
programme.desc: Murad, an underdog, struggles to convey his views on social issues and life in Dharavi through rapping. His life changes drastically when he meets a local rapper, Shrikant alias MC Sher.

programme.title: Table No. 21
programme.desc: Vivaan and Siya, a couple bored with their married life, enter a game show to win an attractive prize. However, the activity soon turns into a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Jodi No 1
programme.desc: Best friends Jay and Veeru are small-time crooks and are on the run from a local goon. Their next target is Raisaab, a wealthy businessman who they intend to con for his riches.

programme.title: Shivam
programme.desc: Shiva proves to be the ideal friend who helps lovers unite. However, when he falls in love with Tanu, he faces a challenge in the form of Bhoji Reddy and he must also tackle Abhi, who kidnaps Tanu.

programme.title: Holiday: A Soldier Is Never Off Duty
programme.desc: Virat, a soldier, accidentally bumps into a terrorist who plans to rip apart Mumbai with a series of bomb blasts. He then gathers his team to protect the city from the impending danger.

programme.title: Bengal Tiger
programme.desc: Akash, a simple man, falls in love with politician Gajapathi's daughter, Meera. However, on learning the identity of Akash's father, Gajapathi suspects that he wants revenge for a past transgression.

programme.title: Judaai
programme.desc: Lured by wealth, Kajal asks her husband, Raj, an honest engineer, to get married to Janhvi, the rich daughter of his boss. Little does she know about the problems that await her.

programme.title: Makkhi
programme.desc: Nani loves Bindu but he is murdered by Sudeep, a rich and shrewd businessman who lusts for her. He is then reincarnated as a fly to avenge his death and protect Bindu.

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: Twenty-year-old Missy Grubaugh, a devout Christian, is saving herself for marriage. But Missy's innocent charms attract the wrong type of men, with deadly results.

programme.title: Blood Relatives
programme.desc: A couple enjoy the fruits of their labour after their grown children move out of the house. However, old family demons begin to creep into their lives.

programme.title: Haunted Towns
programme.desc: The team heads to Georgia to investigate the site of a tragic 1900 train crash, assumed to be an impact of an unseen force at play in the town.

programme.title: True Conviction
programme.desc: In 1988, Cindy Apelt is found dead in the Arizona desert. Further, investigators delve into the case aiming to bring justice to the victim's family.

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: Twenty-year-old Missy Grubaugh, a devout Christian, is saving herself for marriage. But Missy's innocent charms attract the wrong type of men, with deadly results.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: In Grand Rapids, Michigan, local mother Laurie Lundeberg is gunned down outside her home. As leads run dry, police find a second victim.

programme.title: Who The Bleep Did I Marry?
programme.desc: Joylynn finds love with Robert, so much so that she gets married to him. However, a years-old cold case reveals her husband's twisted double life.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Young Michael Blanco believes that his mother indulges in violent things to keep the family safe. However, years later, he discovers the truth.

programme.title: Shattered
programme.desc: Larry Schlegel visits his elderly mother at the hospital before she succumbs to pneumonia. Years later, the police inform him her death was not what it seemed.

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: A retired corrections officer believes that he has survived the riskiest years of his life. However, dealing with his second wife and her jealous ex-husband proves to be far more deadly.

programme.title: Dates From Hell
programme.desc: A man corresponds with a woman he finds on an online dating site and eventually decides to meet her. However, things do not turn out as imagined.

programme.title: Who The Bleep Did I Marry?
programme.desc: Kathleen thinks she has a picture-perfect life with her husband, Bruce. However, Bruce gets overly attached to his smartphone in 2011, prompting Kathleen to investigate his online life.

programme.title: Web Of Lies
programme.desc: 13-year-old Kacie Woody meets two male friends via the internet. But one of these boys is not what he seems, as Kacie's innocent online contacts turn to tragedy.

programme.title: Blood Relatives
programme.desc: A couple enjoy the fruits of their labour after their grown children move out of the house. However, old family demons begin to creep into their lives.

programme.title: The Playboy Murders
programme.desc: Experts and eyewitnesses shed light on the dark stories of obsession and murder that intersect with Playboy, an American lifestyle and entertainment magazine.

programme.title: Who The Bleep Did I Marry?
programme.desc: A woman is devastated when her boyfriend seemingly vanishes without a trace. However, it is not long when she learns that she is one of the many victims of her lover's lies.

programme.title: Redrum
programme.desc: A devoted couple are executed in front of their adopted baby boy. Detectives try to figure out whether the child's birth mother or their trusted young nanny was behind the murder.

programme.title: Mother, May I Murder?
programme.desc: The filmmaker tracks the stories of mother-child bonding taking a sinister turn as they work together to kill, torture, manipulate and conspire against family and in America.

programme.title: Shattered
programme.desc: A girl desperately seeks shelter at a neighbour's house when her mother's marriage takes a gruesome turn. However, her refuge is not all it seems.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: William Cosden Junior coerced sisters, Karen and Susan, into keeping secret of what he did. Later, they reunite to repair the trauma keeping those secrets caused them.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: Tracey Ocasio is missing and when one of her boots is found in woodland, detectives fear the worst. A vicious assault of another young woman may be connected to her case.

programme.title: Ghost Asylum
programme.desc: The Waverly Hills Sanatorium enslaves the spirits of agonized tuberculosis patients who were experimented on and died here.

programme.title: Blood Relatives
programme.desc: A once-happy family is frayed by anger and jealousy when an unlikely affair is revealed, and a tattoo seals the fate of more than one member of this family.

programme.title: True Conviction
programme.desc: When a mother and daughter are found murdered in rural Florida, the police are stumped. But then, a mysterious phone call and dogged detective work lead to a conviction.

programme.title: Haunted Towns
programme.desc: The TWC head down to Louisiana's paranormally charged Manchac Swamp. Further, they are the first team ever to investigate the site of America's largest slave revolt.

programme.title: Who The Bleep Did I Marry?
programme.desc: Kathleen thinks she has a picture-perfect life with her husband, Bruce. However, Bruce gets overly attached to his smartphone in 2011, prompting Kathleen to investigate his online life.

programme.title: Redrum
programme.desc: A violent father is executed in his home and his widow seems unfazed by his murder. The police soon wonder if she knows who killed her husband.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: A domestic dispute escalates into a hostage situation with the lives of children at stake. Elsewhere, a vehicular accident turns into a shocking incident involving multiple murders.

programme.title: Mystery Masters
programme.desc: John Walsh delves into the intriguing case of a young con man who targeted older men in a series of scams until it turned deadly.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Jill Garrison thought her second chance with love may last forever. However, when her town was beset by a killer, she did not realise she had invited him into her home.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: The murder of a popular EMT devastates the local police in Columbus, Georgia and the ensuing investigation tests the public's faith in law enforcement.

programme.title: Web Of Lies
programme.desc: Two days before her due date, pregnant teen Amanda gets into the car of a seemingly generous stranger she met online.

programme.title: Sleepless In Seattle
programme.desc: Realising that Sam has still not come to terms with his wife Maggie's death, his eight-year-old son Jonah forces him to call a national radio talk show, with the hopes of finding him a companion.

programme.title: Stuart Little 3: Call Of The Wild
programme.desc: Stuart and his family set out to spend their vacation in a lakeside cabin. When Snowbell is taken captive by a beast in the forest, Stuart sets out to rescue him.

programme.title: Philadelphia
programme.desc: A young Philadelphia lawyer who is infected with AIDS keeps his homosexuality hidden from his employers. When he is suddenly dismissed, he hires a homophobic lawyer for a wrongful dismissal suit.

programme.title: Armed And Dangerous
programme.desc: A former police officer and his lawyer friend get employed as security guards. However, upon learning of the company's unscrupulous activities, they decide to launch an investigation.

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: An entertainment-based programme.

programme.title: Chef Vs Fridge
programme.desc: Chef Vicky Ratnani lays down a challenge to Chefs Joshua D' Costa and Satvika to prepare a recipe that includes baby spinach, oyster mushroom, coconut cream, raw banana, drumsticks and soaked rice.

programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: A giant man-eating crocodile attacks innocent people at Black Lake, a vacation spot in Maine. Soon, a dysfunctional group of experts is called in to end the beast's reign of terror.

programme.title: The Marine 6: Close Quarters
programme.desc: Maddie Hayes is kidnapped by a gang of international criminals. In order to save her, Jake Carter and a former Marine Luke Trapper join forces.

programme.title: The Quick And The Dead
programme.desc: Ellen, a mysterious gunslinger, arrives in Redemption to seek revenge on Herod, the ruthless leader of the place. However, she must first defeat highly skilled gunslingers in an elimination contest.

programme.title: Absolutely Anything
programme.desc: A group of eccentric aliens gives an ordinary human being named Neil the limitless power to do anything he wants. Unbeknownst to Neil, this is an experiment to see if Earth deserves to be destroyed.

programme.title: Half Past Dead
programme.desc: A man is imprisoned for stealing 200 million dollars worth of gold and is scheduled to be executed. A criminal mastermind goes undercover to persuade the man to tell him where he hid the gold.

programme.title: Save Yourselves!
programme.desc: Lovers, Jack and Su, decide to put away their phones for a week and travel to an isolated cabin. But when aliens invade the Earth and they remain unaware, they find themselves in trouble.

programme.title: Drunken Master
programme.desc: Wong, a mischievous young boy, learns a special form of martial arts from his alcoholic master in order to prevent an assassin from executing his goals.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Alice wakes up to find that Raccoon city is infested with zombies and monsters. Later, she tries her best to find a way out of the city before it is too late.

programme.title: Men In Black
programme.desc: Agents K and J must stop an alien from getting his hands on the Galaxy, a powerful energy source, to stop an intergalactic war.

programme.title: Monster Run
programme.desc: Jimo, a woman who has the ability to see monsters, does not want to admit to it. However, soon she joins hands with a monster hunter to fight the evil creatures.

programme.title: Philadelphia
programme.desc: A young Philadelphia lawyer who is infected with AIDS keeps his homosexuality hidden from his employers. When he is suddenly dismissed, he hires a homophobic lawyer for a wrongful dismissal suit.

programme.title: Murder, She Baked: A Plum Pudding Mystery
programme.desc: Hannah becomes engrossed in solving the murder of a man found dead in his own office. However, when the list of suspects seems to extend beyond the ex-wife, the matter escalates dangerously.

programme.title: Frankenfish
programme.desc: Genetically modified snakeheads that belong to a wealthy hunter satiate their appetite by killing unsuspecting people in the Louisianian bayou.

programme.title: Cruel Intentions 2
programme.desc: In this comedy-drama, a young troublemaker engages in a battle of wills with his heartless stepsister who is manipulative, cold-hearted.

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: An entertainment-based programme.

programme.title: Chef Vs Fridge
programme.desc: Chefs Hemal Shah and Ranjandeep Bhasin face the challenge of preparing a delicious meal using the limited ingredients in their refrigerator.

programme.title: Boa Vs. Python
programme.desc: A genetically altered, gigantic python escapes its confines and the FBI has to stop it. However, they pit a bio-engineered boa constrictor against it to end its terror.

programme.title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
programme.desc: After a night of revelry, four friends accidentally run over a man and dump his body to conceal their secret, unaware that the following year brings a series of eerie events in their lives.

programme.title: Never Back Down: No Surrender
programme.desc: Former martial arts title holder prepares to return to familiar fields and uses his traditional fighting skills against the new line of fighters in order to reclaim his position.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2

programme.title: Hellboy

programme.title: Holmes & Watson

programme.desc: Alo dedicates her life for her family but gets dejected when they take her for granted. Later, Alo decides to stand up for herself and earn the respect that she truly deserves.

programme.title: Please Don't Date
programme.desc: Home appliance developer Seo Jisung dreams of an easy life like a welldesigned algorithm. The "smart voice recognition AI refrigerator" she is in the process of developing accidentally gets combined with an antiterrorism super sensor chip that went missing from the National Intelligence Service Korea. Her refrigerator that couldn't even determine whether an ingredient was rotten suddenly identifies human lowlifes without even needing her to tell it to. This leads to revealing the truth about Jisung's fiance. The man she thought of as an elite was actually a criminal. At the perfect timing, Jung Gukhee, a firefighter that seems too good to be true shows up in her life.

programme.title: Please Don't Date
programme.desc: Home appliance developer Seo Jisung dreams of an easy life like a welldesigned algorithm. The "smart voice recognition AI refrigerator" she is in the process of developing accidentally gets combined with an antiterrorism super sensor chip that went missing from the National Intelligence Service Korea. Her refrigerator that couldn't even determine whether an ingredient was rotten suddenly identifies human lowlifes without even needing her to tell it to. This leads to revealing the truth about Jisung's fiance. The man she thought of as an elite was actually a criminal. At the perfect timing, Jung Gukhee, a firefighter that seems too good to be true shows up in her life.

programme.title: Jadui Nagari
programme.desc: Animated stories that teach us how to live our lives. Stories for the entire family, which explain that while being greedy leads to your downfall, working hard and honestly is rewarding. Also, if we scheme against others, we ourselves fall into that trap. Such values and more, which are necessary to be passed on from parents to the child. Every story and character is relatable, which makes it a must watch program!

programme.title: Super Comedy Express
programme.desc: Watch Comedy Express for fantastic ideas on how to decorate your room, create innovative projects with things which would otherwise be thrown away. A family-friendly and pet-friendly show, meant to be watched together. Get motivated and cheered up by this energising and unique content!

programme.title: Maskari
programme.desc: Watching Bhains Ki Taang will leave you laughing-out-aloud. The stories are about everything that goes wrong in a village - from a groom who doesn't get married, to one who loses his wife. A friend who troubles everybody in the village, to a son-in-law who ends up tearing his father-in-law's clothes! Watch this show for more such situational comedy.

programme.title: Maskari

programme.title: Mridul Ki Duniya
programme.desc: Mridul lives with his parents and his older brother, Nitin. His mother runs the house and looks after the family with a strictness which will elicit laughs and also be relatable to all families! Mridul's father looks after his family, but is extremely stingy when it comes to money, leaving Nitin and Mridul to come up with schemes to get a little pocket money out of the household expenses. A must-watch show for all families and age groups, which will make you laugh out loud!

programme.title: Shudh Desi Tadka
programme.desc: Chef Kapil: Chef Kapil delivers easy and healthy recipes in his soothing voice. Watch Chef Kapil for easy to make recipes, including home made tikkas, main course dishes and desserts. Learn to make chocolate lava cake, paneer khurchan and more recipes at home. The best part? Chef also gives alternative ingredients, so that nothing can come in the way of your cooking! Enjoy the dishes and Chef Kapil's engaging personality.

programme.title: Thari Bijili
programme.desc: Thari Bijli represents our daily life, with a healthy dose of humour! Bijli covers topics we can relate to, like a grandparent gone missing and the entire household searching for her. Or, what happens when Bijli and her grandmother are unable to make a call because of poor network connectivity. Each day, every family member is trying to do their best in a way which makes us smile and laugh. You will love Thari Bijli for the family and their antics!

programme.desc: An entertaining show which shows our every day lives with humour and wisdom.

programme.title: Sweety Special
programme.desc: Laugh your hearts out in the all Bak Bak Baklol, now with an extra dose of entertainment. The stories are about road trips, super heroes, scientists whose inventions are stolen by goofy goons, a husband who acts innocent, but is a prankster and more!

programme.title: Jila Lotapur
programme.desc: Enter the world of laughter, intrigue, drama, and imagination, which is Zilla Lotapur. Watch this show to catch these stories and to be thoroughly entertained.

programme.desc: Watch Comedy Express for fantastic ideas on how to decorate your room, create innovative projects with things which would otherwise be thrown away. A family-friendly and pet-friendly show, meant to be watched together. Get motivated and cheered up by this energising and unique content!

programme.title: Yaar Mera Superstar
programme.desc: Be prepared to laugh, to be scared, to learn something with this motley group of young artists. The stories range from the funny, which also carry important messages about not being greedy and working hard, and also show zombies! Watch Yaar Mera Superstar for thrilling episodes!

programme.title: Maskari
programme.desc: Watching Bhains Ki Taang will leave you laughing-out-aloud. The stories are about everything that goes wrong in a village - from a groom who doesn't get married, to one who loses his wife. A friend who troubles everybody in the village, to a son-in-law who ends up tearing his father-in-law's clothes! Watch this show for more such situational comedy.

programme.title: Mridul Ki Duniya
programme.desc: Mridul lives with his parents and his older brother, Nitin. His mother runs the house and looks after the family with a strictness which will elicit laughs and also be relatable to all families! Mridul's father looks after his family, but is extremely stingy when it comes to money, leaving Nitin and Mridul to come up with schemes to get a little pocket money out of the household expenses. A must-watch show for all families and age groups, which will make you laugh out loud!

programme.title: Sweety Special
programme.desc: Laugh your hearts out in the all Bak Bak Baklol, now with an extra dose of entertainment. The stories are about road trips, super heroes, scientists whose inventions are stolen by goofy goons, a husband who acts innocent, but is a prankster and more!

A show you cannot miss, for your dose of feel-good TV watching!
